alert.note: Alert for Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Northampton County through 315 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nassawadox, or near Exmore, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Northampton County, including the following locations... Birdsnest, Machipongo, Wardtown, Franktown and Silver Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
